channel.title: How do i pick up items from codes?
channel.description: hi how do i pick up the items from the codes?????????????????? ;D

item.title: How do i pick up items from codes?
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

[quote=“cccrrraaazzziii, post:2, topic:74879”]If your talking about a pick up command, try:

::pickup 0995 100000000, that’s an example. And if that works, you can spawn just about anything.[/quote]
ya and you can find out the ids on the client it says help click it then go to item ids if its a 3 digit number do ::pickup 0999 111 if its 4 digit do ::pickup 6570 1

Read full topic
item.source: How do i pick up items from codes?

item.title: How do i pick up items from codes?

@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

If your talking about a pick up command, try:

::pickup 0995 100000000, that’s an example. And if that works, you can spawn just about anything.
